text:
@gauthamzzz You can only invest with time & money.

So Basically:
- Personal learning & growth
- Build stuff that creates value
- Buy stuff that enhances productivity, comfort & happiness
- Travel & experience new things
- Spend time with family & loved ones
- Work for health & fitness
- etc
